headline: HIG Posts Q4 Earnings Beat on Higher Premiums & Investment Income
summary: Hartford posts Q4 2025 adjusted EPS of $4.06, beating estimates by 27.9% as improved combined ratios and higher investment income lift results

headline: Is Hartford (HIG) Still Attractively Priced After A Strong Multi Year Share Price Run
summary: If you are wondering whether Hartford Insurance Group is still attractively priced after a strong multi year run, this article will walk through what the current share price might be implying. The stock last closed at US$132.37, with returns of 1.9% over 7 days, a 4.7% decline over 30 days, a 3.5% decline year to date, and gains of 17.8% over 1 year, 88.5% over 3 years and 188.2% over 5 years. These moves sit against a steady flow of insurance sector headlines and investor attention on...
